item.title: When Passing Tests Lie
item.description:
48 tests passed. Zero failures. 94% coverage.

I deployed with confidence. First production request: authentication failed. Every request failed. Nothing worked.

The tests lied.

I’ve seen this pattern more times than I can count. A team shows me their test suite with pride â€” high coverage, fast execution, green across the board. Then I ask one question: when did you last start your server fresh and make a real HTTP request?
